oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Earl Scruggs - set one - 2004-09-14
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Second of four Artist in Residence performances by Earl Scruggs from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 14, 2004. Set one of two. Special guests include Gary Scruggs, Billy Thomas, Aubrey Haney, Rob Ickes, Jon Randall, Randy Scruggs, Marty Stuart, Mac Wiseman, Larry Cordell, Jerry Douglas, Dan Tyminski, Cowboy Jack Clement, Kris Kristofferson.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Scruggs; Gary Scruggs; Billy Thomas; Aubrey Haney; Rob Ickes; Jon Randall Stewart; Randy Scruggs; Marty Stuart; Mac Wiseman; Larry Cordell; Jerry Douglas; Dan Tyminski; Jack Clement; Kris Kristofferson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Introductory comments by Kyle Young. Performances include; Salty Dog Blues (Gary Scruggs - vocals) -- Black Mountain Blues (Randy Scruggs - guitar) -- Introductions of guests -- Cry, Cry, Cry (Marty Stuart - vocal) -- I Wish I Had Someone To Love Me (Mac Wiseman - vocal) -- Murder On Music Row (Larry Cordell - vocal) -- Down The Road (Dan Tyminski - vocal) -- No Expectations (Jack Clement - vocal) -- Doin' My Time (Gary Scruggs - vocal) -- Why Me (Kris Kristofferson - vocal) -- tape end.
